round_best: Develop a hybrid machine learning model that integrates multi-modal data fusion techniques with probabilistic graphical models to address the challenge of diverse feature types and high missing value rates in longitudinal human behavior data. This model will use Bayesian networks to estimate missing values and infer causal relationships among behaviors and health outcomes, while convolutional neural networks (CNNs) can process sensor data from devices for real-time predictions. Additionally, implement a model shrinking algorithm post-training to reduce the model's resource consumption without compromising predictive accuracy, ensuring its feasibility for deployment on low-power devices like smartphones and smartwatches.
